features: Good level ground feel and protection with goo toe articulation for great balance and active stability.
Provides Flexibility of a barefoot shoe with a little more structure
Special Rope Traction Lugs in arch for rope climbing
Circular lug pattern for grip during lateral movements
Sole Spec: • INSOLE: 2mm EVA Footbed + NZYM Anti-Microbial Poly Fabric Sockliner • MIDSOLE: N/A • XS Trek outsole compound : 4 MM
Upper Material: Polyester + Lateral TPU Panels
